there's a phase at the beginning called

can kind of opt in or opt out of the

dependencies they need to install
uh there's a restore phase that restores
a cache um
from the last build there's an analyze

image and says
you know it figures out if there are any
layers that are already just
you know uh are already good don't need
to get rebuilt and can stay on the
registry
when the next image gets built there's a
build phase that builds new layers and
there's an export phase that
you know puts those layers uh on the
registry to create the new image and
then at the end there's a caching phase
that'll
kind of store any build time artifacts
that might need to
come around next time and so
